group_1.textLeft: Okay, let's start filming.
We'll start it like we're picking up from where@the previous video left off.

group_1.textRight: Is your phone attached to the selfie stick?

group_1.textLeft: It is, but how do I turn it on?
The screen is so far away that I can't reach it...

group_1.textRight: You just need to press the button on the handle.
That way, you don't need to touch the phone@to take pictures.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, really?! I didn't expect that...

group_1.textRight: Hm...? Wait a minute, Sis,
the camera's been running all along!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100153:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh?! You mean I already pushed it?!
O-okay, calm down, calm down...
We've been in good hands here!

group_1.textRight: We're going to introduce you to everyone at@Mikazuki Villa!
All the girls who live here are really kind@and so much fun to be around!

group_1.textLeft: You'll get to meet our first housemate@here in the kitchen!

group_1.textRight: At Mikazuki, we all take turns doing chores.

group_1.textLeft: And the one in charge of cooking today is...
...the head of Mikazuki Villa:

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo!

group_1.textLeft: Happy New Year, Mr. and Mrs. Tamaki!

group_1.textRight: Are you cooking right now?

group_1.textLeft: Indeed.

group_1.textRight: I can't wait! I love Yachiyo's cooking;@it's delicious!

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* Thank you.
I always prepare my dishes with proper@nutrition in mind.
Since the girls who live here are still growing,
I strive to make meals that will satisfy them@in body and soul.
So please be at ease, Mr. and Mrs. Tamaki.
...I'm sorry, Iroha, but please stop the camera.

group_1.textRight: Huh?! S-sure!
Wh-what is it...?

group_1.textLeft: I don't think I heated the food properly.

group_1.textRight: It's hard to cook and talk at the same time...

group_1.textLeft: Raw and burnt food are both hazardous@to our health,
so it's critical to maintain control over@the heat.
Your parents will be so worried if they see@this video...

group_1.textRight: Well, personally, I didn't notice anything@wrong...
Yum! It tastes really good!

group_1.textLeft: But still...they say there's no fooling@a housewife.

group_1.textRight: I think you're worrying about this too muchâ€“

group_1.textLeft: ARGH! No! I can't stop thinking about this!
Is this even the right kind of food to be@showing them?!
This was from the "10 times the points" day@at the grocery store!
Maybe it'd be worth splurging on some organic@vegetables from the farmer's market...
No... To start with, I should... And then...

group_1.textRight: Y-Yachiyo...?
Um...we think the food you make for us@is really good and healthy.
Yeah, that's right!

group_1.textLeft: R-really...? Then...
No, wait!
Let me think about it some more!

group_1.textRight: What?!

group_1.textLeft: It's expensive...but...

group_1.textRight: Oh, here we go again...

group_1.textCenter: Yachiyo, I feel like you're overthinking this...

group_1.textRight: Maybe we should record something else first.

group_1.textLeft: ...And then if I cook it over low heat...
